Description of incident: About 13,000 employees at Pfizer              Inc., including about 5,000 from Connecticut, had their personal information              compromised when a company laptop and flash drive were stolen. No              Social Security numbers were on the laptop, but names, home addresses,              home telephone numbers, employee ID numbers, positions and salaries              were possibly compromised. Other information possibly lost included              the department employees worked in, the Pfizer site where the employees              worked, the name of employees' managers and descriptions of              their jobs.
